validations.message: Only bold, italic, underline, code, superscript, subscript, and strikethrough marks are allowed

Only heading 1, heading 2, heading 3, heading 4, heading 5, heading 6, ordered list, unordered list, horizontal rule, quote, block entry, asset, table, link to asset, inline entry, link to entry, and link to Url nodes are allowed
Value must be one of: Professor, Associate Professor, Assistant Professor, PhD Student, Master Student, Research Assistant, Alumni
the value must be left or right
Only bold, italic, underline, code, superscript, subscript, and strikethrough marks are allowed

Only heading 1, heading 2, heading 3, heading 4, heading 5, heading 6, ordered list, unordered list, horizontal rule, quote, block entry, asset, table, link to asset, inline entry, link to entry, and link to Url nodes are allowed
Value must be one of: JOURNAL ARTICLES, CONFERENCE PROCEEDINGS, POSTGRADUATE THESES, UNDERGRADUATE THESES, INTELLECTUAL PROPERTIES
the value must be granted or pending
Value must be one of: Research Opportunity, Job Opportunity
the value must be one of: full time, part time
Phone number must follow +12025550123, max 15 digits

settings.helpText: an image related to the event
a string showing the read time eg "4 min read"
some tags about the projects in that research topic
eg. ongoing, funded, Telecom Corp, High Priority
reference a research topic as a value
Value must be one of: JOURNAL ARTICLES, CONFERENCE PROCEEDINGS, POSTGRADUATE THESES, UNDERGRADUATE THESES, INTELLECTUAL PROPERTIES
string representation of the year eg. 2012
this value is used with JOURNAL ARTICLES type only
This value is used only with JOURNAL ARTICLES type
This value is used only with JOURNAL ARTICLES or CONFERENCE PROCEEDINGS types
This value is used only with CONFERENCE PROCEEDINGS types
This value is used only with POSTGRADUATE THESES or UNDERGRADUATE THESES
This value is used with INTELLECTUAL PROPERTIES and all THESES types
only with THESES types. eg. June 2024
only with INTELLECTUAL PROPERTIES must be granted or pending
the string represntation of the date March 15, 2025
Value must be one of: Research Opportunity, Job Opportunity
the value must be one of: full time, part time
text representation of the duration eg. "two weeks"
value must be: opened, or closed
a text representation of the date, eg. June 2026
Phone number must follow +12025550123, max 15 digits
